original_text:
Oh, that I had one to hear me!
    (Here is my signature! Let the Almighty answer me!)
    Oh, that I had the indictment written by my adversary!
korean_text: 누구든지 나의 변명을 들어다오 나의 서명이 여기 있으니 전능자가 내게 대답하시기를 바라노라 나를 고발하는 자가 있다면 그에게 고소장을 쓰게 하라

sentences.original_text: Oh, that I had one to hear me!
Oh, that I had the indictment written by my adversary!
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 내 대적이 쓴 고소장을 가졌으면!
